startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: Array of URLs to start crawling from

maxRequestsPerCrawl.title: Max Pages to Crawl
maxRequestsPerCrawl.description: Maximum number of pages to crawl and analyze

crawlUrls.title: Crawl URLs
crawlUrls.description: Whether to crawl and analyze multiple pages from the website

includeImages.title: Include Image Analysis
includeImages.description: Whether to analyze images for alt text and optimization

maxImagesPerPage.title: Max Images Per Page
maxImagesPerPage.description: Maximum number of images to analyze per page. Use -1 to fetch and analyze all images on the page (default). You can set a specific number to limit the analysis.

waitForPageLoad.title: Wait for Page Load
waitForPageLoad.description: Time to wait for page to fully load (in milliseconds)

userAgent.title: User Agent
userAgent.description: User agent string to use for requests

includeSitemapAnalysis.title: Include Sitemap Analysis
includeSitemapAnalysis.description: Whether to perform domain-level sitemap analysis

sitemapTimeout.title: Sitemap Analysis Timeout
sitemapTimeout.description: Timeout for sitemap analysis requests (in milliseconds)
